name: 4chan - Light Shadow
description:
Saxamaphone !3.saxN0DHY with:
Light Shadow (v1.0)

A bright, clean and unified layout for DEFAULT 4chan.
If you use 4chan extension, 4chan4chrome or any UserScripts, you'll have to do some work.

FOR A DARKER VERSION: http://userstyles.org/styles/41100

Featuring:
hovering navbar
custom postarea
hovering pages box
full width replies
NO checkboxes (meaning NO reporting and NO post deleting)
removes ADS, LINES ACROSS THE PAGE and OTHER USELESS SHIT
